entry.source: When the statue of Hachiko in front of{F801}Shibuya Station has three heads, {F801}{F804,5}the pack from hell{F804,0} led by{F801}Cerberus appears. I'm sure they don't {F801}mean any harm, but they also set the{F801}river ablaze and people have died.{F801}Can you get rid of them for us?{F801} {F801}
